file_content.text: You scum...
Team Alpha down. She is tough.
Team Alpha down. He is tough.
But you are tougher, yes?
Yes, sir.
The "Red Blade" at last. The scheming Imperial who stole the crown of crime king from me!
If we'd met, I'd remember you.
Who are you?
I worked to support Nem'ro the Hutt under that name. That makes you... Nem'ro's rival?
The Red Blade was on Hutta...
You got that right.
I've crossed the Cartel on three planets--you expect me to tell one Hutt from another?
I hear that a lot.
I remember him. Nem'ro's rival on Hutta. Hello, Fa'athra.
The girl who burned my holdings. I heard you had left, but I did not know you joined this... creature.
I am Fa'athra, exile of Hutta and last of the Miasmic Order of Ardos.
You stoked the war between Nem'ro and myself. You made him ally with the Empire, and I lost our feud.
For months, I wandered the galaxy like Zobara and Noh, the great Hutts of old. Then the truth was shown to me.
All right. What's this "truth"?
The truth?
You didn't wind up on Voss by accident. Who led you here?
How'd you track me down?
A Republic man contacted me. Revealed the part you and your Empire played in my downfall.
He gave me your name, said you would be on Voss. Now, in accordance with the First Blood-Law of Evona, I extract payment for misdeeds in flesh.
Your friend in the Republic... young, SIS, winning smile?
Hunter sent you, didn't he?
You know your enemies, but you underestimated me. Ha!
Hutta is behind us. I have no quarrel with you, Fa'athra.
I don't want to hurt you.
But I have one with you.
Kill her!
Kill him!
Learn to let go of a grudge. You'll get yourself killed.
Go ahead and try. [Attack]
Mind if I skip the speech and just start shooting?
I don't need this. [Attack]
Now!
No recordings this time. I finally get to see your face.
Congratulations on disabling those scanners. Sending coordinates to our meet.
I want proof that Bas-Ton is alive and unharmed.
Let me talk to Bas-Ton.
Hold on.
They have an old commando outpost. They--
We'll be waiting.
Who are you? Why did you take Bas-Ton?
What's this all about?
That, you'll want to ask my boss... and time's wasting.
As soon as I arrive, you shoot me and Bas-Ton dies next.
I won't walk into a trap.
Maybe. But if you don't show up, we'll be gone before you can do anything.
Hold right there.
